Part - III: (Defect Details)
a) Defect Category: Minor
b) Defect Observed: Engine vibration level increase. Abnormality observed during system test.
Part IV: Investigation: (Details of Examination including previous similar Defects)
a) Root Cause Analysis: Age-related degradation of elastomeric components
b) Findings / Conclusions: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Compressor Section component.
Physical examination revealed signs of wear and degradation.
c) Remedial Measures Revise maintenance procedure to include additional verification steps
i. Corrective Action:
ii. Preventive Action: Introduce protective coating to prevent environmental degradation
d) Attributable Code: M - Other Reasons
Remarks: Comprehensive analysis performed. Root cause identified and verified.
Part V: Remarks by Design
Technical evaluation completed. Proposed preventive measures are appropriate and align with design intent.
